Content:: The 2022 Dwars door Vlaanderen was a road cycling one-day race that took place on 30 March 2022 in Belgium. It was the 76th edition of Dwars door Vlaanderen and the 11th event of the 2022 UCI World Tour. It was won by Mathieu van der Poel.[1] All nineteen UCI WorldTeams and six UCI ProTeams participated in the race. Of the twenty-five teams, three - Cofidis (6), Ark√©a–Samsic (6), and Israel–Premier Tech (5) - did not compete with the maximum allowed seven riders.[2] UCI WorldTeams UCI ProTeams This cycling race article related to Belgian cycling is a stub.
